pr_title: CB-7343 [opdb] Add Hue in the opdb blueprint

timeline.message:
CB-7343 [opdb] Add Hue in the opdb blueprint

Hue talks to HBase via the Thriftserver and can be used to view/modify data.
This change adds Hue to the opdb blueprint and enables thriftserver.

Testing: Created cluster from custom blueprint and verified that Hue turns up.
Tried CRUD operations on a sample table from the Hue UI.

timeline.bodyText: If we only have one Hue server, do we still need the Hue LB?
timeline.author: joshelser

replies.bodyText:
Short answer: Yes
Long answer: As we discussed Josh, CM doesn't have an issue with having just one Hue Server neither does Hue have any problem bringing up a single server without a load balancer. But the Hue Web UI via KNOX wouldn't be accessible as it depends on the load balancer to be up. So, yes.
replies.author: jatsakthi
